subject: Weekly Update
body: Hey, can you send me the weekly update when you get a chance?

subject: Tech Digest - January Edition
body: Welcome to this month's Tech Digest! Here are the top stories in AI, robotics, and more.

subject: Claim Your Free Gift!
body: Congratulations! You have been selected to receive a free gift card. Click the link to claim.

subject: Policy Update Reminder
body: We want to remind everyone to review the updated company policies shared last week.

subject: Project Concerns
body: We have reviewed the initial proposal. Please let us know your thoughts before Friday.

action_items.task: Provide thoughts on the initial proposal

subject: Quick Check
body: When you're free, could you look at the latest UI changes?

action_items.task: look at the latest UI changes

subject: URGENT: Deck Needed
body: You must complete the onboarding deck by Friday. This is your top priority.

subject: Upcoming Town Hall
body: Join us for the monthly town hall next Tuesday. No action is required.

subject: Lunch?
body: Are you free for lunch today?

subject: Appreciation Note
body: Great job on the Q4 analysis. Your efforts are appreciated!

subject: Unusual Activity Detected
body: We detected a login attempt from a new device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account.

subject: Status Update Request
body: Please send me the updated hiring tracker before the meeting tomorrow.

subject: ðŸ”¥ 90% OFF LIMITED TIME ONLY
body: Don't miss out on these unbelievable deals! Click now before it's gone!

subject: Photos from the trip
body: Hey! Finally sharing the trip photos. Let me know what you think :)

subject: Meeting Tomorrow
body: Can you join the project sync at 3 PM tomorrow? No prep required.
